snippet.title: BLUMA - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Bluma in this cozy puzzle-platforming adventure where you make the platforms. It’s up to Bluma and her magical tail to unite the elemental realms by solving physics-based puzzles and farming vegetables.

Play the demo now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3032520/BLUMA/
